title: Foreign Language Training Design Based on Cognitive Congruence Principles: A Process-Oriented Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language education theory and secondary education field experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers practice foreign language training methods applying the cognitive congruence principle, focusing on reconstructing learning experiences through process-oriented instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can present at least three specific strategies for applying the cognitive congruence principle to foreign language training design.
Learners can develop training scenarios that link learners' cognitive levels and language processing stages using process-oriented instructional methods.
Learners can identify cognitive mismatch elements occurring during training and derive improvement plans through formative assessment tools.

resources: Interactive online collaboration tools (Miro, Jamboard, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
